h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: Now comes your final challenge, and just like before, if you die, you'll be sent back to the Heart of Birthstone Keeper's Shrine. You won't need to fight the Stone Monkey again, however.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell'.
The content is as follows:
Now comes your final challenge, and just like before, if you die, you'll be sent back to the Heart of Birthstone Keeper's Shrine. You won't need to fight the Stone Monkey again, however.
